text: haey pitabrakd nasa nih chea meakra robsa yeung da troem trauv dau che neah chaur puok anak brate b tde tam vea . haey chaur puok anak kom brate b tde tamophlauv neanea( phlauv v nge v ng) proh vea nung bambekpuok anak chenhpi meakra da troemotrauv robsa trong . teangnih trong ban phdephdam vea champoh puok anak sangkhumtha puok anak nung kaotakhlach a l laoh
